transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good evening sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir, good evening.
Customer: Yeah, tell me sir.
Executive: Na Krishna pesaren sir India Mart manager Krishna, apparam Dinesh pesinaar la.
Customer: Enna sir?
Executive: Na Krishna pesaren India Mart manager pesaren.
Executive: Sollunga sir.
Customer: Atha appala oru concern kaaga vandu Dinesh vandu pesi irundhaanga la sir actually.
Customer: Aamaanga sir.
Executive: Aama unga enna support vendanalum neenga Dinesh kum koopidalaam apparam Vinayagar rendu perukum koopidalaam ok va.
Customer: Hmm, saringa sir.
Executive: Ok further aa namma endha endha location business pannittu irukkom ippo namma.
Customer: Enna sir?
Executive: Puriyalainga sir.
Executive: Salem.
Customer: Aatha Salem thaan endha location varaikum namma pannittu irukkom endha location varaikum namma product delivery thara mudiyum.
Customer: All over India sir.
Executive: All over India ok sir appo naan enna pandren na namma company Vinayagaran Dinesh enakku mail pottu irundhaanga ippo andha unga oru sila location la idhu vandu leads mattum konjam consume consume panna increase pannunga naan enna pandren na andha location la irundhu namma company la irundhu vara incoming calls direct aa unga mail increase konjam improve panni tharen andha location la irundhu ok va.
Customer: Ok sir.
Executive: Sir all over India engu vendanalum ok sir.
Customer: Ok sir purinjathu MOP all over India na most focused endha location sir India la full aa.
Customer: Sir most focus paathinga na ella field la paathinga na onnu Orissa la irukku sir.
Executive: Ok Orissa most focus.
Customer: Orissa Bihar Orissa Jharkhand UP
Customer: Orissa Gujarat Rajasthan.
Customer: Sir north side fulla thaan sir adhiga supply aagum.
Customer: North fulla sir.
Customer: Fulla thaan sir aana most focus vandu Orissa Jharkhand UP
Customer: UP Rajasthan Gujarat Maharashtra.
Customer: Purinjathu Rajasthan Maharashtra.
Customer: Maharashtra.
Customer: Maharashtra sir.
Executive: Ok Orissa Orissa Jharkhand UP Rajasthan Maharashtra correct thaan.
Customer: Ok sir avlo thaan sir.
Executive: Adhu illama near by states ellame correct thaan la near by states ellame.
Executive: Appo enna puriyum na neenga leads consume pannumbodhe already namma pasanga solli iruppaanga consume pannumbodhe enna pandringa appidina andha left corner la India nu oru option irukkum adha click panni neenga leads consume pannunga.
Customer: Sir idhu enna lead fulla empty thaan sir fulla empty thaan sir.
Customer: Enna sir puriyalainga.
Customer: Lead andha lead option le fulla empty thaan sir irukku oru lead um illai sir.
Executive: Adhaan sir pannunga filter panni filter panni panni paathinga sir appo thaan sir.
Customer: Enna sir ippo eppavume enna na pesi endha improvement tharalaam nu solli ippo Dinesh kitta pesumbodhu neenga solli iruppinga correct thaan la Dinesh enakku inform pannittaaru unga Dinesh um Vinayagar um serndhu adha rectify panniruvaanga ungalukku ok va.
Customer: Ok ok sir.
Executive: Innonnu ungalukku business conversion edhula nadakkuthu sir ungalukku incoming calls la ya buyleads la ya illa vandu direct aa vara mail la ya.
Customer: Buyleads la thaan sir naan buyleads eduthu naane call panni pesanukku conversion aagum.
Executive: Adhula thaan ungalukku business convert aaguthu correct thaan la aamaanga sir.
Executive: Ok ippo namma product vandu paathinga na industrial level product correct thaan la ippo industrial compare pannumbodhu paathinga na foreign tree.
Customer: Aama namma buyers ellame vandu paathinga na business pannittu irukkom correct thaan la avanga ellarume potential aana buyer appidina enna pannuvaanga na direct aa mail la thaan inquiry tharuvaanga correct thaan la.
Customer: Ok aamaanga.
Executive: Andha maari inquiry konjam vandhuttu irukku adhaiyum konjam neenga concentrate pannunga mail la vandhuttu irukku nammalukku adhu appidina neenga mail la thaan paakanum illa namma lead manager irukku la aamaanga sir.
Executive: Mobile application system irukku andha lead manager le paaka vendiyadhu.
Customer: Ok ok sir.
Executive: Aama apparam calls um vandu paathinga na calls maximum ellam attend pannidreenga pona maasam mattum pathu call vandha neenga anju call attend panni irukkeenga maximum ella calls um neenga attend pannitteenga ok va aamaanga aamaanga sir.
Executive: Regular aa use pannunga endha doubt irundhaalum Vinayagaran kum koopidalaam neenga Dinesh kum koopidalaam ok va ippo naan whatsapp la oru message kooda podren ok va en number kooda neenga save panni vachukonga enakku kooda neenga eppo vendanalum koopidalaam sir ok va ok ok sir.
Executive: Ippo south la eppadi sir irukku indha product marketukku namma namma south India la.
Customer: South la thaan sir supply pannuvaanga ellaathukkume.
Customer: Most supply se vandu sir south la irukku correct thaan la south la thaan sir irukkaanga adhu most ly Salem thaan sir andha area la irukku.
Executive: Adhu vandu namma product angu irukkaradhu correct thaan la ungalukku whatsapp la screenshot anuppi iruppaaren andha andha location la irundhu neenga leads eduthu irukkeenga.
Customer: Saringa saringa sir.
Executive: Whatsapp paaren.

Executive: Idhu ellame ellam neenga already buyleads consume panna location sir ok va.
Executive: Idhula unni konjam adhiga use edunga Vinayagar Dinesh kum kooda support panna solren ok va idhu ellam whatsapp um thaan sir regular aa use pannunga ok sir endha doubt irundha kooda neenga enakku kooda koopidalaam saringa ok ok sir andha concern mattum close pannidunga sir enna pathina feedback um kooda varum adhai mattum konjam kodunga ok sir close pannidunga sir ok pannunga close pannunga ok sir ok thank you sir thank you thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads option is empty.

- Customer wants to know about product market in South.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to rectify lead issue.

- Executive shared screenshot of locations with leads.

- Executive asked to use leads regularly.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, buyleads, product, locations, support
